$description:
| What does this do? | Establishes a policy that prevents passwords from expiring. |
| Why should you use this? | Microsoft and NIST recommend not rotating passwords unless there is evidence that the password is compromised or the user forgot it. |
| What is the end-user impact? | Users will not be required to periodically change their passwords. |
| Learn more | [Password policy recommendations](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/admin/misc/password-policy-recommendations?view=o365-worldwide) |
